title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4057.1 - Second place saves entrance fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4057.1 - Second place saves entrance fee

State Regulations

In all sweepstakes (private sweepstakes excepted) or
purses, the second horse shall at least save the horse's entrance
fee. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4057.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
